GoldenEye::

She looks at the new comer and back at Drillbit, "My name is 
GoldenEye..  And thank you again for helping me and my friend." 

 In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod still sat in the warroom, just thinking about finding the
> Autobots. His former friends, campanions, allys.
> 
> ::K-9::
> 
> He didn't wait for permission. He walked around the CF, and found 
the
> room where Prowl and Iron Rapter were in.
> "Hello, where could I find the commander?" He asks.
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit glanced back at Phobia.
> "Hey, welcome back." He says. He turned his head back to the new
> arrival.
> "So, whats your name?"
> 
> OOC: like Zardus, I'm not one for speeches. Also, I have only been 
here
> for two months, so I havn't seen all the changes of the RPG. But I 
am
> going to try and say something, so here goes.
> 
> Most RPGs do not make it over 20 members, and only last a few 
months.
> Here we are, one year, and nearly 50 members. Over the summer, we
> averaged a post every 30 seconds. What does this all mean? It means 
that
> Neo Beast Wars RPG is the greatist Transformers RPG, if not the 
greatist
> RPG there is. Lets all work to make it even better.
> HAPPY BIRTHDAY NBWRPG!!!
